subtitle: Use firm, just-ripe fruits for these speedy barbecue desserts. Remember to soak the wooden skewers first to help prevent them burning. You can use orange juice in place of Cointreau.

method.text: Peel papaya, kiwi and pineapple and cut into chunks. Put into a bowl.
To make the glaze: Mix orange rind, juice, lemon juice, sugar and Cointreau. Pour over the fruit and leave to soak for 1 hour.
Just before cooking, peel and chop the bananas and toss in the glaze.

Arrange the fruit on short skewers. Brush with the glaze while cooking on a prepared barbecue for 5-6 min. Alternatively cook kebabs under hot grill until bananas look golden, about 4-5 min each side.

title: Exotic fruit kebabs
